Description.S:
After a short buildup, Thor leaps into the air. While in the air, Thor can target a great distance away to come crashing down in the area, dealing damage and Stunning all enemies in the radius. After Thor lands from his ultimate, his hammer Mjolnir is infused with lightning for 6 seconds.
During this buff state, each of his basic attacks and abilities chain lightning to nearby Enemy gods, damaging them with each hit
